attributes.contentHtml: This child also made up a comany named "Create X" which he claims is owned by his uncle, He has a "contract" on a discord server, oh and he "doesn't care about laws"

attributes.bio:
Papi Jedrik — 07/29/2021
I can't handle this community anymore, it was fun at the start with winterhoax, i'll save you the hassle, i'm resigning

Sloth — 07/29/2021
my thoughts exactly

attributes.contentHtml: Jedrik Yeah very weird one time he sent announcements claiming some Anthony has temporarily has paused his company in a what he called "Security Message". In the message, he sent a screenshot. It was sent 0 minutes ago with HTML icons and stuff. So he and "his uncle" are the same people. According to him, Anthony is the CEO. But again 0 minutes ago. very weird kid. Sadly he removed all channels and messages so I cannot send proof that happened.
Jedrik 100% correct. He makes false claims and banned me for just having fun and just kidding with my friend racco.
